name: preprandial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening before lunch or dinner: The bar is a great spot for a morning cappuccino or a preprandial cocktail. What could be better with a pre-prandial bowl of olives than a crisp, dry sherry? Compare
postprandial
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a pretty garden where guests can enjoy afternoon tea or a preprandial drink.They had a drink before the meal, with preprandial snacks.The preprandial nibbles can be more expensive than the main course!
